Html:
GoF Design patterns described by this sample pack are not advanced F# but object oriented programming.

They should be under some other topic than "Advanced".

How about "Avoid"?

In my opinion advanced F# would be language specific features like:

- Builder pattern (computational expressions)

- MailboxProcessor

- Numeric literals

- Active pattern (not very useful, but is already...nice!)

- Quotations

- ...
